author: Not available

text.0: Exsurge, domine, adiuua nos, et libera nos propter nomen tuum.
text.1: Aris, drihten, nu           and us ricene do
text.2: fælne fultum,           and us æt feondum ahrede,
text.3: forðon we naman þinne           nyde lufiað.

source: The Complete Corpus of Anglo-Saxon Poetry
